title: James Freeman & Caitlin Freeman: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Coffee lovers and food lovers will enjoy this conversation with co-authors of The Blue Bottle Craft of Coffee, pastry chef Caitlin Freeman and founder & CEO James Freeman. The Freemans, along with moderator and journalist Oliver Strand, dig into their book, the world of craft coffee, and a behind-the-scenes look at Blue Bottle, the much-respected coffee micro-roaster that introduced the Japanese-style "siphon bar" and changed coffee in the United States forever.
itunes:summary: Coffee lovers and food lovers will enjoy this conversation with co-authors of The Blue Bottle Craft of Coffee, pastry chef Caitlin Freeman and founder & CEO James Freeman. The Freemans, along with moderator and journalist Oliver Strand, dig into their book, the world of craft coffee, and a behind-the-scenes look at Blue Bottle, the much-respected coffee micro-roaster that introduced the Japanese-style "siphon bar" and changed coffee in the United States forever.
itunes:keywords: James Freeman, Caitlin Freeman, The Blue Bottle Craft of Coffee, Blue Bottle, Oliver Strand, craft coffee, foodie, foodies, cookbook, cookbooks, coffee, author, interview, apple store
